name: Improved Aspect of the Hawk
baseDescription: While Aspect of the Hawk is active, all normal ranged attacks have a 1% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 12 sec.

name: Endurance Training
baseDescription: Increases the Health of your pets by 3%.

name: Improved Eyes of the Beast
baseDescription: Increases the duration of your Eyes of the Beast by 30 sec.

name: Improved Aspect of the Monkey
baseDescription: Increases the Dodge bonus of your Aspect of the Monkey by 4%.

name: Thick Hide
baseDescription: Increases your Armor contribution from items by 2%.

name: Improved Revive Pet
baseDescription: Revive Pet's casting time is reduced by 6 sec, mana cost is reduced by 40%, and increases the health your pet returns with by an additional 30%.

name: Pathfinding
baseDescription: Increases the speed bonus of your Aspect of the Cheetah and Aspect of the Pack by 3%.

name: Bestial Swiftness
baseDescription: Increases the outdoor movement speed of your pets by 30%.

name: Unleashed Fury
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 10%.

name: Improved Mend Pet
baseDescription: Gives the Mend Pet spell a 15% chance of cleansing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic or Poison effect from the pet each tick.

name: Ferocity
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 3%.

name: Spirit Bond
baseDescription: While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate 2% of total health every 10 sec.

name: Intimidation
baseDescription: Command your pet to intimidate the target on the next successful melee attack, causing a high amount of threat and stunning the target for 3 sec.

name: Bestial Discipline
baseDescription: Increases the Focus regeneration of your pets by 10%.

name: Frenzy
baseDescription: Gives your pet a 20% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for 8 sec after dealing a critical strike.

name: Bestial Wrath
baseDescription: Send your pet into a rage causing 50% additional damage for 18 sec. Â While enraged, the beast does not feel pity or remorse or fear and it cannot be stopped unless killed.
